channel.title: WHAT do you play a server for?
channel.description: well... ill be honest as far as i am concerened i have finished my pking on server 99.99%.... prayer... bonus'... farcasting... autocasting... the LOT. But now comes to me the challenge of the way the server flows... What do people that play servers want to be able to have access to or do ect... is it Quests? is it a big Community? is it to be Challenging? is it to be Long Lasting? What do people play servers for? What keeps them STUCK in?

item.title: WHAT do you play a server for?
item.dc:creator: @PulseX PulseX
item.description:
@PulseX wrote:

Well developed economy + good staff + no fast leveling.

Read full topic
item.source: WHAT do you play a server for?

item.title: WHAT do you play a server for?
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

Ancient Maul:

lol prima wanna be partners? Cuz you seem to of alredy started working on economy, atm I have almost finished pking… its basicly perfect. Defence Bonus’ Range Bonus’ Attack Bonus’ Magic Bonus’ Strength Bonus, even PRAYER Bonus’. I have 100% prayer/100% prayer buttons/100% prayer headicons. I have syncronized Pking Timers. I have PK magic queing, I have eating Queing. I fixed food and edibles so that it eats and replaces the item that u click(if you had empty inv and drank a pot in a random spot the next dosage will appear same spot). I have Wild Levels, i have proper gmaul specz, i have recoils, i have proper bow farcastinng(dont move b4 stopping), I have perfect ancient teleports(Delay + Invulneribility), 100% Blood/Ice Barrage with magic bonus effects on multi casting/with multi freezing. I stopped freezing stacking so meleers have a second or to to run up to opponent. When you are frozen by a spell you are stopped if you are running. and like loads more

I have All of that, plus Alot more, and Perfect PKing.

Read full topic
item.source: WHAT do you play a server for?

item.source: WHAT do you play a server for?

item.title: WHAT do you play a server for?
item.dc:creator: @D_R_U_G D R U G
item.description:
@D_R_U_G wrote:

Ussaly on my server people come on a server to get challenged.

What ussaly keeps them is, challenging NPC’s, mini-games and maybe quest

also A Long lasting server also helps because if its ALWAYS on they’ll eventually tell other people to play and it justs spreads you know,

PKING is a big deal senice Runescape lost pking so always make pking fair but not to easy,

Thats what i look for in a server,

Read full topic

item.source: WHAT do you play a server for?

item.title: WHAT do you play a server for?
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

My server is going to be Like Old RuneScape.

It has All skills working, apart from agility, Full combat, Full magic bonuses, defence bonuses, and delays, Full ranged projectiles, Perfect vengeance, Has the same Map as RS (Same NPC’s and Shops), Has the REAL Animated armours and Armour animator object (You use a piece of armour on the object, and it spawns An animated armour), Perfect pking, with the wilderness skull, Full Prayer, and headicons, All Potion’s work, Full RCing with perfect essance mining, and you right click and click teleport on the Mage of Zamorak, to teleport to the Abyss, Four working quests so far, two quests, two mini-quests (Lost city, Desert Treasure, Mage arena, and the Zamorak mage miniqyest), FULL Barrows, and ALOT of ways to make money.

The skills are Hard, and the Money is Hard.

I might make a Development topic for this later.

Read full topic
item.source: WHAT do you play a server for?

item.title: WHAT do you play a server for?
item.dc:creator: @Ancient_Maul Ancient Maul
item.description:
@Ancient_Maul wrote:

ye hustlin i do agree, having access to most of the map would be pleasant. Also seeing as i have made pking so close to runescapes inc wild level max 56 ect, it would be stupid to have fast training and stuff because everyone would get 126 sooner or later and most that stuff i added wont be as important as ect. a lvl 113 vs 94 having better bonus’. Ill definetly try my best on that idea

Read full topic
item.source: WHAT do you play a server for?

item.title: WHAT do you play a server for?
item.dc:creator: @Ibehustlin247 Ibehustlin247
item.description:
@Ibehustlin247 wrote:

Alot of times the more like old runescape it is the more attracted people are to it, thats why battlescape was so popular, had everything that old runescape had… Also ALOT of players do enjoy having quests to complete as long as they arent as hard as runescape quests, they come to private servers to get away from all of the bigger challenges in runescape… alot do anyways and this is what I look for in a server: A good economy, steady training, as many features as possible, access to alot of the map.

Read full topic
